attributes.action: Making sure children and family services have to go by the law of evidence
attributes.additional_details: They are  YouTube and Facebook post about this and even BBC panorama program about this
attributes.background:
I have had problems with child and family services for some time I complained about giving out false information about myself
And was told yes we did it but we are not going to do anything about it 
And I all so been told they don't have to follow the rule of law and that is wrong

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

In any case, we can't accept this petition because this isn't something that the Government and Parliament can help you with. Social services are the responsibility of local councils.

If you want to complain about social services, or get more advice about what action you could take, this website may help you: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/health/nhs-and-social-care-complaints/

If you are not happy with the way that a council has handled a complaint, you may be able to complain to the Local Government Ombudsman: 
http://www.lgo.org.uk/make-a-complaint
